AbstractWrapperAuthenticationHandler<I extends Credential,C extends org.pac4j.core.credentials.Credentials> - Class in org.jasig.cas.integration.pac4j.authentication.handler.support
Abstract pac4j authentication handler which uses a pac4j authenticator and profile creator.

U

UsernamePasswordWrapperAuthenticationHandler - Class in org.jasig.cas.integration.pac4j.authentication.handler.support
Pac4j authentication handler which works on a CAS username / password credential and uses a pac4j authenticator and profile creator to play authentication.
